About Us Text:
Your gateway to local businesses right in your town. We're thrilled to introduce our beta version, starting with the vibrant community of Fresno. Our mission is simple: to expand access to the wonderful array of small businesses and hidden gems that make our towns special.

At Things On Wheels, we understand the struggle of finding the best food spots or exploring unique markets without a centralized platform. That's why we're here to bridge that gap. Whether you're craving delicious cuisine or seeking out charming local markets, our app is your one-stop solution.

But we're not stopping in Fresno. Our vision extends far beyond, envisioning every small town with its own tapestry of flavors and experiences, just waiting to be discovered. With your support, we aim to bring accessibility and convenience to communities far and wide.

Your feedback is invaluable to us. Please don't hesitate to share your thoughts and suggestions via email. And if you're a local business owner looking to showcase your offerings, reach out to us at oggooggp19962000@gmail.com.

Thank you for joining us on this journey. Together, let's unlock the essence of our towns, one discovery at a time.
faq_thingsonwheels_desc: Thingsonwheels is your gateway to local business to town. Small stall, businesses, food trucks which are hard to find will be available on our app
faq_location: Why is the app only in Fresno and Santa Maria?
faq_location_desc: We are currently starting from our locations and will slowly and steadily come to more areas as we get more users and more data.
faq_delete_account: How can I delete my account?
faq_delete_account_desc: If you would like to delete your account,
faq_delete_account_note: Note we keep the account for 30 days for security reasons and will delete it after 30 days of inactivity. You can login anytime between those 30 days. If you have more questions regarding your account deletion, please do not hesitate to contact us at oggpoggp19962000@gmail.com
faq_privacy_policy: What is the privacy policy of this app?
faq_privacy_policy_desc: You can check out our privacy policy here on our official website:
faq_merchant_name: Why cannot I change my merchant Name?
faq_merchant_name_desc: The merchant name can only be set once. If you would still like to change it, just send us an email at oggpoggp19962000@gmail.com and telling us why you want to change the name
faq_menus: Can we upload menus if we own food trucks or restaurants?
faq_menus_desc: Not at the moment but we are working on getting merchants to upload their menu info and order placement will soon also be added.
do_you_really_want_to_delete_your_accoun: Do you really want to delete your account? Note all your information will be deleted including all the merchant information as well.
acceptance_text: By downloading, installing, or using Thingsonwheels, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.
license_text: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use Thingsonwheels for personal, non-commercial purposes.
user_accounts_text1: You may be required to create an account to access certain features of the app.
user_accounts_text2: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for any activities that occur under your account.
user_conduct_text1: You agree not to use Thingsonwheels for any unlawful or prohibited purpose.
user_conduct_text2: You agree not to interfere with the operation of the app or to engage in any activity that disrupts or harms our services.
intellectual_property_text1: Thingsonwheels and its content are protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.
intellectual_property_text2: You may not modify, reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works based on our app without our prior written consent.
limitation_of_liability_text1: We shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or relating to your use of Thingsonwheels.
limitation_of_liability_text2: Our total liability for any claims arising from or related to the app shall not exceed the amount you paid, if any, for accessing the app.
governing_law_text: These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States.
changes_to_terms_text: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms and Conditions at any time. Your continued use of Thingsonwheels after any such changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms and Conditions.
contact_us_text: If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at oggpoggp19962000@gmail.com.
